# PLAYER::IS_PLAYER_BATTLE_AWARE

## Summary
Is player currently in a gun fight?

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns true if an unk value is greater than 0.0f
